nodes.text: Hetnagaro was a world that the Galactic Empire devastated during its reign, at some point by 4 ABY. Along with planets such as Alderaan and Nacronis, Hetnagaro was one of the worlds that the New Republic U-wing pilot Kairos wished to avenge through the destruction of the Empire.
Hetnagaro was mentioned in Alphabet Squadron, a novel written by Alexander Freed and published in 2019.
